title: What Does the 💋👄 Lips Emoji Mean?

steps.title: Most commonly, the 💋 emoji represents a kiss.
steps.content: Most commonly, the 💋 emoji represents a kiss. It can replace the words “kiss” or “kissing” in a message or add extra emphasis at the end of a message that talks about kissing somehow. Use it when you want to send somebody you love a kiss. “Wanna 💋 you so bad!” “Thinking about kissing you right now… 💋”

steps.title: The 💋 emoji is often seductive.
steps.content: The 💋 emoji is often seductive. Because it looks like a lip print made by lipstick, there’s a sultry quality to the 💋 emoji. Couples often use it to flirt, entice, or outright seduce their partner through messages. Use it when you want to show someone that you’re ready to turn up the heat! [1] X Research source “Tonight is going to be amazing. 💋” “Still thinking about the dream I had about you last night! 💋🥵”

steps.title: Sometimes, the 💋 emoji can be used in a friendly way.
steps.content: Sometimes, the 💋 emoji can be used in a friendly way. While it’s often considered flirty or seductive, it’s also common practice to send 💋 to someone you’d comfortably kiss on the cheek or forehead—a best friend or family member, for example. It’s a great way to say, “Love you, friend!” “Girl, you’re amazing. Thanks for the help yesterday! 💋” “I hope you’re having a lovely day, mom! 💋”

steps.title: The 💋 emoji might mean that a person is being sassy.
steps.content: The 💋 emoji might mean that a person is being sassy. When someone talks about kissing in a playful or sarcastic context, they might use the 💋 emoji for emphasis. It can also be used as a cheeky follow-up after saying something with a little too much honesty. “I’m not saying a word! My lips are sealed. 💋” “You can keep talking, but I don’t actually care that much. 💋” “If you want that, you’d better 💋 your wallet goodbye!”

steps.title: A 👄 emoji usually indicates speech or vocals.
steps.content: A 👄 emoji usually indicates speech or vocals. You can use it more literally in place of writing the word “mouth” or “talk,” or you can use it as emphasis when referencing a conversation. You could even use it to compliment someone’s voice or ask them to stop talking. [2] X Research source “The vocal cords on this woman are amazing! 👄🎶” “I swear this dude will NOT stop talking. 👄” “Hey, can you keep it down out there? The 👄 is getting pretty loud.”

steps.title: The 👄 emoji can also be used to send kisses.
steps.content: The 👄 emoji can also be used to send kisses. In most versions of the emoji, its lips look slightly puckered, like they’re about to kiss someone. [3] X Research source As such, you can also use it in place of the word “kiss” and give someone a virtual smooch. The context of the “kiss” can be romantic, familial, or friendly! “Sending kisses today! 👄” “Please accept this digital 🤗 (hug) and 👄, since I’m not there to give you real ones!” “I’m gonna give you the biggest 👄 when I see you tonight! 😍”

steps.title: Both 💋 and 👄 can be used interchangeably as a kiss.
steps.content: Both 💋 and 👄 can be used interchangeably as a kiss. Because they look similar, it’s easy to associate either emoji with kissing—and you can use them to replace the word "kiss" or add emphasis to a message. However, they have secondary meanings that make them useful individually, with 👄 also referring to talking and 💋 having more sassy and seductive vibes. “Romance is in the air tonight…💋👄” “Enough chatting! Let’s get to the action. 👄💋”

steps.title: 👄 can be combined with other talking-related emojis.
steps.content: 👄 can be combined with other talking-related emojis. The most common combination, 👁👄👁, generally means “it is what it is.” On TikTok and Twitter, it’s a typical comment when people think something is bizarre or cringe—like saying “wow” without words. [4] X Research source Other combinations with 👄 include: ​💰​👄​ - Money talks ​💤​👄​💬​ - Talking in your sleep ​👄​💬​👂​ - A secret ​🙅​👄​🙅​ - Never say never ​👀​➡️️​👄​💬​ - Look who’s talking

steps.title: 💋 also has more meanings when paired with emojis.
steps.content: 💋 also has more meanings when paired with emojis. You can use it in many different scenarios related to romance, kissing, and even pop culture. [5] X Research source For example: ​👆​💋​ - First kiss 👋💋 - Goodbye kiss ​❌​⭕​💋​ - Gossip Girl ​💋​💄​ - Lipstick
